name: Baan Krating Khao Lak

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked the cheapest (standard) room and it wasn' t too big, but it was in a shack all on its own, with a balcony, overlooking the cliffs, pool and sea which was a lovely touch.
reviews.title: Two thumbs up for Baan Krating

likes.liked: — The fact that each room is actually a little house built on stilts
likes.disliked: — Takes a bit of a walk down the steps to the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Didn't try the restaurant hotel but it didn't look too good, quiet and few patrons. However, the hotel itself is connected to another restaurant specializing in Isaan food. Ordered food from that restaurant to be deliverd straight to our "shack" and ate on the balcony. Very genuine spicy Thai food so pls tell them to tone down the chilli if you can't take spicy food.
reviews.title: Don't go

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we loved the experience, couldn't be better for the price, which we booked straight with the Baan Krating offices in Bangkok. A walk to the beach, with many steps so not ideal for elderly or children but overall a GREAT hotel, perfect for couples. You get a mini-villa for the price of a standard room, what more to ask.
reviews.title: Cockroaches
Interesting but overpriced
reviews.text: Yes there are slight smells, but we did not see one cockroach/bug inside the room, and the smell did not bother me one bit.

Ultimately, we definitely recommend Baan Krating for the overall feel of sleeping in a jungle shack, not in mere rooms separated by walls from other guests. Not recommended for ppl who can't walk up many stairs though. If you need to get into town, just call the reception for a song-taew taxi, which will cost 100 baht.
reviews.title: This Place Could Be Great...

likes.disliked: — Staff, lack of upkeep, lack of cleanliness

reviews.title: A Very Poor Management & Lack of Consideration
reviews.text: I would like here tell you how we were astonished by the poor maintenance of Baan Krating Khao lak resort during our stay 24-28 february 2006.

aka: Baan Krating Khao Lak Hotel Khao Lak
